Opposition parties reject Azerbaijan's snap election call as undemocraticAzerbaijan's two main opposition parties on Monday denounced the calling of a snap election, in which President Ilham Aliyev is expected to extend his 20 years in power, as undemocratic and said they would not field candidates. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 16:00:10 GMT O2MCAQR26NMW5MCUWVUOU7ILY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/opposition-parties-reject-azerbaijans-snap-election-call-undemocratic-2023-12-18/Reuters世界亚太地区
Ukraine's top general criticizes president's firing of recruitment chiefs- mediaUkraine's top general on Monday issued his strongest criticism to date of a previous presidential decision to fire regional military draft office chiefs, Interfax Ukraine reported. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 15:55:52 GMT 5VXZEE6ADBNH7FNNQHE6Z37N44 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraines-top-general-criticizes-presidents-firing-recruitment-chiefs-media-2023-12-18/Reuters世界欧洲
Serbian elections marred by president's involvement, vote buying - observersSerbia's snap elections have been marred by "unjust competition" by the ruling Serbian Progressive Party (SNS), the presence of President Aleksandar Vucic in the campaign, media bias and vote buying, an international monitoring mission said on Monday. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 15:53:24 GMT SUN5K3QTTNJSNM5M6PDFCIJ4J4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/serbian-elections-marred-by-presidents-involvement-vote-buying-observers-2023-12-18/Reuters世界欧洲
Polish truckers resume blockade of Ukrainian border crossingPolish truckers on Monday resumed their blockade of one of the main crossings at the Ukrainian border, a protest leader said, a week after it was temporarily lifted. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 15:02:27 GMT FXDO5FDZ5ZOUVM4RE3UBCMI3BQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/polish-truckers-resume-blockade-ukrainian-border-crossing-2023-12-18/Reuters世界欧洲
Nikola founder Trevor Milton to be sentenced over fraud convictionTrevor Milton, the convicted founder of electric- and hydrogen-powered truck maker Nikola , is set to be sentenced on Monday after a jury in October 2022 found him guilty of lying to investors about the company's technology. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 14:58:05 GMT SEJAH5EXEZOQBM4K6WAOPQATTQ https://www.reuters.com/legal/nikola-Founder-trevor-milton-be-sentenced-over-fraud-conviction-2023-12-18/Jody Godoy合法的诉讼
EU plans Feb 1 summit on budget, including Ukraine funding -EU's MichelThe European Union will hold an extraordinary summit on Feb. 1 in a bid to settle revisions to its multi-annual budget, including funding for Ukraine, European Council President Charles Michel said on Monday. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 14:56:26 GMT AUPITUV3CVNG5PXIP6Q7U7VD24 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/eu-plans-feb-1-summit-budget-include-ukraine-funding-eus-michel-2023-12-18/Reuters世界欧洲
Vatican approves blessings for same-sex couples in landmark rulingThe Vatican said on Monday in a landmark ruling approved by Pope Francis that Roman Catholic priests can administer blessings to same-sex couples as long as they are not part of regular Church rituals or liturgies. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 14:10:12 GMT QO42ED5MSVJZ3KYQZC4FWF4DOU https://www.reuters.com/world/vatican-approves-blessings-same-sex- Couples-under-certain-conditions-2023-12-18/Philip Pullella世界
Seventy nine opposition MPs suspended from Indian parliamentAt least 79 opposition lawmakers were suspended from the Indian parliament on Monday for disrupting proceedings as they demanded a government statement and a discussion on the security breach of the chambers last week. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 14:04:24 GMT NMQZORIFEVMLRAICMPI4ANPBKQ https://www.reuters.com/world/india/seventy-9-opposition-mps-suspended-indian-parliament-2023-12-18/Nigam Prusty世界印度
Unwashed and underfed, babies born into Gaza war face hardship in tentsThe grandmother has a simple wish for her twin baby granddaughters, Alma and Salma: they should be in a clean, safe room where they can be bathed. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 13:42:22 GMT 6ZIZWKOKDFKKZEO3QJQ4DRD2YI https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/unwashed-underfed-babies-born-into-gaza-war-face-hardship-tents-2023-12-18/Fadi Shana, Saleh Salem世界中东
Ukraine's army chief says situation at front line is not a stalemateUkraine's army chief said on Monday the situation on the front line of the war against Russian forces had not reached a stalemate. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 12:44:39 GMT VPGCRQ4Y75KKXFAIJIGSHPRWYU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraines-army-chief-says-situation-front-line-is-not-stalemate-2023-12-18/Reuters世界欧洲
Red Sea attacks force rerouting of vessels, disrupting supply chainsMounting attacks by the Iran-aligned Yemeni Houthi militant group on ships in the Red Sea are disrupting maritime trade as global freight firms reroute around the Cape of Good Hope to avoid the Suez Canal. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 12:24:09 GMT S2FXMVTWS5NJDN5KSZMNLFMSUU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/red-sea-attacks-force-rerouting-vessels-disrupting-supply-chains-2023-12-18/Reuters世界中东
